page.title: 08Clubs
page.content: Myton-on-Swale Women's Institute was formed in 1931. They met alternately at the School at Myton and the old village hall at Tholthorpe until 1965 when Tholthorpe village school closed and became the Village Hall where meetings have been ever since. The membership which covers the three villages of Flawith, Myton and Tholthorpe is usually in the mid twenties. Kyle Valley Scout Group moved from Tollerton in 1983. The Group provides scouting for thirty 8 to 11 year old boys, nineteen 11 to 16 year old boys and nine 16 to 20 year old boys abd girls. The catchment area is a 10 mile radius for the older ones. There are six adult scout leaders, three of the leaders live in Tholthorpe. The children come from neighbouring villages. They meet in a building
